p.d: Versailles, 1783. Marie-Antoinette entrusts the construction of a hamlet within the Trianon estate, to the architect Richard Mique. Half-timbered houses, lake, vegetable garden and dairy are set in a romantic Anglo-Chinese style landscape. Restored since 2015, they have regained their charm, revealing an intimate side to the famous French queen. Directed by: Sylvie Faiveley, Mark Daniels (France, 2018)
